Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.bank.internal

Interface Account

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteAccount
public interface Account extends Remote, Serializable
Represents the person's account.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill
